description: Rewild Organics is a brand focused on creating and selling turmeric-based health products, including golden milk powders and tinctures. Operating primarily in Costa Rica, they emphasize fair compensation for farmers and sustainable practices. Their mission is to promote health while ensuring ethical sourcing and production, targeting high-end markets in the U.S. and Canada. Despite challenges in scaling and market visibility, they remain committed to responsible consumerism and the integrity of their supply chain.
name: Rewild Organics
